install.name: CB Login
install.author: Beat and JoomlaJoe
install.copyright: (C) 2005-2011 Joomlapolis.com. This module is released under the GNU/GPL v2 License
install.description: Login module to be used with Community Builder instead of the Login module.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (mod_login), this allows individual module styling

param.name: horizontal
param.label: Module orientation
param.description: Default orientation is vertical for left or right module positions (recommended when displaying avatar). The horizontal orientation is for a compact horizontal module position and does NOT support avatar display.

param.name: compact
param.label: Display type
param.description: By default, the field names are displayed outside the boxes: username: [___] password: [___]. In compact mode, field names are inside fields: [username___] [xxx___] and texts are shorter.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Login Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the login form. HINT: you can use language definition.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Login Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the login form. HINT: you can use language definition.

param.name: logoutpretext
param.label: Logout Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the logout form. HINT: you can use language definition.

param.name: logoutposttext
param.label: Logout Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the logout form. HINT: you can use language definition.

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login. If let blank will reload current page

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the logout redirect to after logout. With a double-cross (#) it will reload current page. If let blank or set to index.php , it will go to home-page, avoiding unauthorized access messages.

param.name: show_lostpass
param.label: Lost password
param.description: Show/Hide the lost password? link

param.name: show_newaccount
param.label: Create account
param.description: Show/Hide the create account text and link. This is not to disable registration (this is done in CB configuration and Joomla/Mambo configuration), but simply to hide it if you have a separate link for that.

param.name: show_username_pass_icons
param.label: Display username/password labels as
param.description: You can display labels for the username and password fields as text (outside the box in normal mode, inside the box in compact mode) or as icons (outside the box in normal mode, inside the box in compact mode).

param.name: name_lenght
param.label: Username length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: pass_lenght
param.label: Password length
param.description: The length in characters the textbox should have not max. characters the box may contain.

param.name: show_buttons_icons
param.label: Display login/logout button as
param.description: You can display text 'Login'/'Logout' or an icon for the login and logout buttons, or as both icon and text.

param.name: show_remind_register_icons
param.label: Display login reminder / register as
param.description: You can display login reminder and register items as text links or icons.

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success

param.name: remember_enabled
param.label: Remember-me checkbox
param.description: Show/Hide the standard Remember-me checkbox. It is possible to have it checked or unchecked by default or always

param.name: greeting
param.label: Greeting
param.description: Show/Hide the simple greeting text

param.name: name
param.label: Name/Username
param.description: Choose what to display with the greeting text

param.name: show_avatar
param.label: Show avatar when logged-in
param.description: Only for Vertical orientation: Select \'Show always\' to show avatar of the logged-in user or \'no image\' picture if none to encourage users to choose avatar. Select \'Show avatar only if chosen\' to avoid \'No image\' display. The \'Pending approval\' image is always displayed.

param.name: avatar_position
param.label: Avatar position
param.description: Default position means centered alone on a line. Left (recommended with avatar if enough space in template) means text flows on the right side of it. Right means the opposite.

param.name: text_show_profile
param.label: Profile link text
param.description: A text or HTML to display in a link to user's profile which displays in login module when user is logged in. WARNING: you always need to create a public menu item to CB Profile (see README file). HINT: you can use language definition. Leave empty to not display. It will follow icons settings for register/login reminder.

param.name: text_edit_profile
param.label: Profile edit link text
param.description: A text or HTML to display in a link to user's edit profile screen which displays in login module when user is logged in. WARNING: you always need to create a public menu item to CB Profile (see README file). HINT: you can use language definition. Leave empty to not display. It will follow icons settings for register/login reminder.

param.name: pms_type
param.label: Private Messaging System
param.description: Choose the system you have installed.

param.name: show_pms
param.label: Private Messages Notification
param.description: Choose if you want to display count of unread PMS messages. PMS integration must be activated in CB configuration.

param.name: show_connection_notifications
param.label: Connections Notification
param.description: Choose if you want to display Connections notifications for pending approvals etc. Connections must be activated in CB configuration.

param.name: https_post
param.label: HTTPS (encrypted) login, register and lost password
param.description: You need https configured on your host for this. This feature is only in Joomla 1.0.13 + Joomla 1.5 and higher
param.option: use https for posting login then same
use https (encrypted) for login and after login

param.name: cb_plugins
param.label: CB Plugins integration
param.description: Choose if you want to use CB events for CB plugins integration. Plugins must be installed and configured in CB plugins management. Warning: this loads CB plugins on each page where this module is displayed, consuming memory and processing power.
